description: A transaction item represents the concept being sold or refunded.

product_code.description: Code of an existing product. If present, you don't need to set the description.

created_at.description: Time at which the object was created. Measured in seconds since the Unix epoch.

description.description: Concept being sold or refunded. Meant to be displayable to the customer.

quantity.description: Quantity of units for the transaction item. Defaults to 1.

discount_rate.description: This represents the discount percent out of 100 included in the amount, if applicable.

amount.description: Total amount of the transaction item. This should always be equal to the amount charged after discounts and taxes.

tax.description: Represents a tax calculation on a transaction item.

taxable_part.description: Percentage of the subtotal used for calculating the tax amount. It's usually 100% but there are a few exceptions. For example, in Texas the taxable base is 80% for SaaS products.

country.description: Country used for the tax calculation.

region.description: Region used for the tax calculation.

tax_code.description: The transaction's tax code used for calculating the tax rate.

additional_name.description: Only for jurisdictions that need to apply two tax rates (e.g. some Canadian provinces).

additional_rate.description: Only for jurisdictions that need to apply two tax rates (e.g. some Canadian provinces).

additional_taxable_part.description: Only for jurisdictions that need to apply two tax rates (e.g. some Canadian provinces).

import.description: Whether the product is considered an import sale or not.
